short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check the statuses of the triggered builds in a Buildkite pipeline, for both async and sync trigger steps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When there are tons of async trigger steps in a Buildkite pipeline, it's a horrifying job to click through each of them and see if they pass. This extension generates the summary of all triggered builds for you.
